body:
Comment 7: 
> the field name should be "b".error
It is.

> the field type should be "a".error (same package as predeclared type error, i.e.
currently compiled package)
I agree. Typechecking fails before this point so can't look at it.

> the field spec in exports should be "struct { ? error }"
It is.

> reference to the field in exports should have the form x.@"".error
They do.
